text: Hanse 675, launched in 2016 Hanse is a brand of sailing yachts that was created by Michael Schmidt in 1993. It is the core brand of German yacht manufacturer HanseYachts, Greifswald. The current range comprises 9 models from 32 to 69 ft in length. Naval architect for all models since 1999 is the German yacht design studio Judel/Vrolijk & Co, Bremerhaven. == Current models (specs) == Weights and measures (metric) {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;font-size:85%;line-height:170%; |- |style="width: 50pt;background: #f2f2f2"| Model |style="width: 35pt;background: #f2f2f2"| Launch |style="width: 35pt;background: #f2f2f2"| Length o.a.
